QuestData.Title: Do the Honors
QuestData.Description: It looks like all that's left to do is to place the orbs on the pedestals at each corner of this mechanism.$b$bWe appear to have stumbled upon what may be the most important find in modern history.$b$b<Harrison looks at you for a moment, then hands you the orbs.>$b$bWell, go ahead, $n.$b$bWe'd have never made this discovery without you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Orbs of the Stars near the mechanism in the Chamber of the Stars.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, now. Would ya look at that!$b$bAs amazing as this is, I am confident that there's more to our discovery than meets the eye...$b$bMuch more.
